payload.name: secrets-should-be-short-lived-and-scoped-prefer-secretless-jit-credentials
payload.title: Secrets should be short-lived and scoped; prefer “secretless” JIT credentials
payload.formal: blast radius scales with secret lifetime and scope.
payload.apm2_mapping: capabilities and session tokens should be time-bounded; tooling should fetch JIT credentials rather than storing secrets in context. Every secret that enters a prompt is a future incident.
